home.title: About me
intro: Hello there! I'm thrilled to welcome you to my portfolio. I am a passionate and versatile
Front-end developer with a keen interest in creating the user friendly apps and websites.
I enjoy applying both new technologies and learning about the Best Practice solid solutions.
I constantly strive to enhance my skills and embrace emerging trends in the industry.
home.subtitle: What I do

activity1.subtitle: Web Development
body: Crafting visually appealing and intuitive user interfaces that offer a delightful user
experience is something I'm truly fanatic about. As well as developing new user-facing
features, optimizing code, building reusable components and using a variety of markup
languages to create the web pages.

activity2.subtitle: App Development

body: I also find very interesting to create websites for small businesses of any kind, from
simple landings and apps to complex online shops with user accounts and admin dashboards.
